definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Rut is one of main disease in asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 车辙是沥青路面的主要病害之一。
这条路留有很深的车辙。

sentences.english: Wheels leave grooves in a dirt road.
sentences.chinese: 轮子在泥路上会留下车辙。

sentences.english: Environment is very important influence factors on rutting damage of asphalt pavement.
sentences.chinese: 环境是路面车辙损坏的重要影响因素。

sentences.english: Our driver slowed up as we approached the ruts in the road.
sentences.chinese: 当驶近路上的车辙时，我们的司机放慢了速度。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a measuring equipment of the highway track.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种高速公路车辙测试仪。

sentences.english: Papers on the rut in Lian-Xu freeway maintenance of key technologies.
sentences.chinese: 论文对连徐高速公路车辙维修的关键技术进行了研究。

sentences.english: At the front of my house is a rut worn by my bicycle wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我的屋前是一条我的自行车轮胎轧出的车辙。

sentences.english: The tractors have made deep furrows in the loose sand.
sentences.chinese: 曳引机在松软的沙土上留下了深深的车辙。

sentences.english: The side tracks off the tarred road were rutted and uneven .
sentences.chinese: 柏油路面两边的辅道上布满车辙，凹凸不平。

sentences.english: Going through treadway bridge is important to driver's training.
sentences.chinese: 车辙桥地形是履带式车辆训练中的重要科目。

sentences.english: The ruts flattened out under the pressure of wheels.
sentences.chinese: 地面上的车辙给车轮压平了。

sentences.english: Tanks had ploughed up muddy roads.
sentences.chinese: 坦克开过泥泞的道路留下了道道车辙。

sentences.english: Even so, the existing track also marks more than 30 cm deep.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，现存的车辙痕也有30多厘米深。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper presents some countermeasures and the gradation not only anti-skid and waterproof but also anti-rutting.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了若干对策以及既抗水损害也抗车辙的级配。

sentences.english: The country roads were muddy and full of furrows left by farm carts.
sentences.chinese: 泥泞不堪，布满了牛车压出的车辙。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
